author: ETA PRIME
description:
Taking a first look at the upcoming AYANEO Pocket VERT, a futuristic DMG-style vertical Android handheld with one of the most interesting control ideas I’ve seen in a retro device: AYANEO “MagicTouch” Smart Dual-Mode Touchpad hidden under the front panel. You can map it as mouse input, left stick, right stick, or even dual sticks—making modern 3D games and emulation way more playable on a vertical handheld.
